title: Jun/2024: Programação Front-End
text: Domine React.js, a biblioteca líder de mercado para Front-End, desde os fundamentos em HTML, CSS e JavaScript até o uso de APIs e testes end-to-end, e desenvolva interfaces de sites e web apps eficientes e escaláveis.
enText: Master React.js, the market-leading library for Front-End, from the fundamentals of HTML, CSS and JavaScript to the use of APIs and end-to-end testing, and develop efficient and scalable website interfaces and web apps.

title: Mai/2024: Three.js, React Three Fiber, Drei, React Spring & More
entitle: May/2024: Three.js, React Three Fiber, Drei, React Spring & More
text: O curso ensina como construir sites 3D imersivos e criativos usando Three.js e React.
enText: The course teaches you how to build immersive and creative 3D websites using Three.js and React.

title: Abr/2024:  Next.js e React
text: Aplicações React profissionais com o Framework NextJS! Além de projetos com TailwindCSS, TypeScript e Firebase. Curso oferecido pela Udemy.
enText: Professional React applications with the NextJS Framework! In addition to projects with TailwindCSS, TypeScript and Firebase. Course offered by Udemy.

title: Mar/2024: Algoritmos JavaScript e Estruturas de Dados
entitle: Mar/2024: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
text: Fundamentos de JavaScript como variáveis, arrays, objetos, loops, funções, DOM e muito mais. Curso oferecido pela freeCodeCamp.
enText: JavaScript fundamentals like variables, arrays, objects, loops, functions, the DOM and more. Course offered by freeCodeCamp.

title: Fev/2024: Fundamentos do Microsoft Azure
text: Curso AZ-900: conceitos básicos do Microsoft Azure.
enText: Course AZ-900: basic concepts of Microsoft Azure.

title: Nov/2023: Web Design Responsivo
text: Fundamentos de HTML e CSS avançados desde design responsivo, construção de uma variedade de projetos práticos até  aplicativos como de fotos, quizzes e layouts. Curso oferecido pelo freeCodeCamp.
enText: Advanced HTML and CSS fundamentals from responsive design, building a variety of practical projects to applications such as photos, quizzes and layouts. Course offered by freeCodeCamp

title: Ago/2022: Web Completo com JavaScript
text: Conceitos avançados em JS e fundamentais em  React, Vue e Angular 9. Capacitando a construir aplicações web modernas e completas, dominando tanto o frontend quanto o backend. Curso oferecido pela Udemy.
enText: Advanced concepts in JS and fundamental concepts in React, Vue and Angular 9. Enabling you to build modern and complete web applications, mastering both the frontend and backend. Course offered by Udemy.

title: Abr/2022: C# COMPLETO Programação Orientada a Objetos
text: Curso de Programação Orientada a Objetos em C#, criando soluções flexíveis e compreendendo diagramas de classe UML. Curso oferecido pela Udemy.
enText: Object Oriented Programming Course in C#, creating flexible solutions and understanding UML class diagrams. Course offered by Udemy.
